sections.heading: Bail undertaking in a criminal action as lien7-105
sections.text: Bail undertaking in a criminal action as lienA. A bail undertaking in a criminal action, or after conviction of a defendant, or upon appeal therefrom shall be a lien on any real property described therein from the time of recording such undertaking
